title: (x) Gucci logo - custom designed {Patricia}
content:
Does anyone know what the typeface for Gucci is? Or perhaps it is a custom made typeface? Please advise. THANK YOU IN ADVANCE...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141010111746im_/http:/typophile.com/files/gucci_6582.gif)
author: bethany

comments.content:
It's a logo. Custom drawn.

From the FAQ: For example if you’re looking for the Gucci logo or the typeface used for the Björk “Volumen” DVD release, do a search by keyword for “Gucci” or “Bjork”, make sure you look in text of messages and limit your search to the Type Identification Board. (BTW they’re both custom drawn so that’s tough noogies.)
Sorry, usually I do a search in advance -- don't know what got into me. Thanks though!

Also see House Industies' Luxury Collection

[http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=536](http://web.archive.org/web/20141010111746/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=536 "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=536")
